comments.body: This could be else rather than else if, which would prevent sort_gp_callback from ever being NULL should any future enumeration for sort be introduced and the person not catch it in this block of code - though, that crash would obviously be caught by the tests. Also, could reduce the number of lines and eliminate that possibility by defaulting the sort to ascending and setting to descending with a single conditional. Not sure from a coding style how you'd like to handle it, so I kept it specific.
